3.2 Jedisè¿æ¥æ± 

â€‹ Jedisæœ¬èº«æ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”é¢‘ç¹çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œé”€æ¯è¿æ¥ä¼šæœ‰æ€§èƒ½æŸè€—ï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘ä»¬æ¨èå¤§å®¶ä½¿ç”¨Jedisè¿æ¥æ± ä»£æ›¿Jedisçš„ç›´è¿æ–¹å¼ã€‚

public class JedisConnentionFactory{
    private static final JedisPool jedisPool;
    static {
        JedisPoolConfig jedisPoolConfig = new JedisPoolConfig();
        // æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥
        jedisPoolConfig.setMaxTotal(8);
        // æœ€å¤§ç©ºé—´è¿æ¥
        jedisPoolConfig.setMaxIdle(8);
        // æœ€å°ç©ºé—²è¿æ¥
        jedisPoolConfig.setMinIdle(0);
        // è®¾ç½®æœ€é•¿ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´ï¼Œ ms

    }
    // è·å–Jediså¯¹è±¡
    public static Jedis getJedis() {
        return jedisPool.getResource();
    }
}

package cn.thylove;

import cn.thylove.pojo.User;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.StringRedisTemplate;

import java.util.Map;

@SpringBootTest
class RedisStringTests {


    @Autowired
    private StringRedisTemplate stringRedisTemplate;

    private static final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();

    @Test
    void contextLoads() {
        // å†™å…¥ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set("name", "è™å“¥");
        // è¯»å–ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®
        String name = (String)stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get("name");
        System.out.println("name = " + name);
    }

    // æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤„ç†  æ‰‹åŠ¨å°†userå¯¹è±¡è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºjsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²     ç„¶åå°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢ä¸ºUserå¯¹è±¡
    @Test
    void stringTest() throws JsonProcessingException {
        User user = new User("è™å“¥", 21);
        String json = mapper.writeValueAsString(user);
        // å†™å…¥æ•°æ®
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().set("user:200", json);
        // è·å–æ•°æ®
        String jsonUser =stringRedisTemplate.opsForValue().get("user:200");
        User redisUser = mapper.readValue(jsonUser, User.class);
        System.out.println(redisUser);

    }


    @Test
    void hashTest() {
        // å­˜æ•°æ®
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForHash().put("user:400", "name", "è™å“¥");
        stringRedisTemplate.opsForHash().put("user:400", "age", "21");

        // å–æ•°æ®
        Map<Object, Object> entries = stringRedisTemplate.opsForHash().entries("user:400");
        System.out.println(entries);


    }
}

@Test
void testRedisson() throws InterruptedException {
    // è·å–é”(å¯é‡å…¥)ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®šé”åç§°
    RLock lock = redissonClient.getLock("anyLock");

    // å°è¯•è·å–ï¼Œå‚æ•°åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯: è·å–é”çš„æœ€å¤§ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´(æœŸé—´ä¼šé‡è¯•)ï¼Œé”è‡ªåŠ¨é‡Šæ”¾æ—¶é—´ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å•ä½

        try {
            System.out.print("å¤„ç†è‡ªå·±çš„ä¸šåŠ¡")
        }finally {
            // é‡Šæ”¾é”
            lock.unLock();
        }
    }
}

6. BitMapç”¨æ³•

â€‹ Redisä¸­æ˜¯åˆ©ç”¨stringç±»å‹æ•°æ®ç»“æ„å®ç°BitMapï¼Œå› æ­¤æœ€å¤§ä¸Šé™æ˜¯512Mï¼Œè½¬æ¢ä¸ºbitåˆ™æ˜¯2^32ä¸ªbitä½ã€‚

  • å½“ä¸»è¿›ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œè¯»æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œè®¿é—®å…±äº«å†…å­˜ï¼›
  • å½“ä¸»è¿›ç¨‹å†™æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šæ‹·è´ä¸€ä»½æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå†™æ“ä½œã€‚
